attributes.review: this is the worst app ive ever used. when i first opened it i was greeted by the ugliest man in human history. he was so ugly, that it damaged my eye sight and gave all three of my children heart attacks. i now have to get eye surgery and plan three funerals. its disgusting how they would leave an app up that kills people. what a terrible app. i hope it gets removed.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded the app thinking I could support the ✨Cheeto✨but instead the app took over my phone and then my phone jumped out of my hands and ran to the kitchen it then grab a knife and killed my family and then I had an epic anime battle with my phone and now I'm writing this review.
attributes.title: This app killed my Family

attributes.review: When I tell you what this app did it came to my house and ate all my dogs and when they tried eating my tacos they said they were too spicy I guess these whites don’t know what flavor is which is ironic cause they legit colonized the hell out of India for spices but just use salt and pepper I feel bad for white people they have no culture
attributes.title: Hey there Delilah

attributes.review: It asked me if I want to see him naked. I hit “no” it asked again. Again, I hit “no”. It kept on going for like another minute and it showed me a message saying “thank you for your support” and I got a call from the guy saying how he thinks it cute. But thank god he didn’t see my face. I don’t recommend this app.
